document_data.name: Citadel Ankhalus
document_data.mainbody: '''Citadel Ankhalus''' was a keep located in the marshlands of [[Thar]], in the [[Moonsea North]] region of [[North Faerûn]], up until the mid–13{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was the base of the [[Masked Wizards of Ankhalus]].
document_data.Geography: It was located in the western region Thar, north of the [[Vanishing Hills]], just southeast of [[Glumpen Swamp]].{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|56}}{{Cite dungeon/177/Realmslore: Vaasa|81}}
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1259}}, the [[Zhentilar]] took action against the Masked Wizards of Ankhalus after suffering several attacks on their outposts at the wizards' hands. They attacked and defeated the group once and for all at the [[Battle of the Masks]]. Lord [[Theilon]] of [[Zhentil Keep]] was killed during the fighting, and Citadel Ankhalus was reduced to a half-melted ruin by summoned lava.
